name: A Simple Job (Kavehes)
description:
A Simple Job is a tile based puzzle-ish game developped for the Playdate during Ludum Dare 51.

Your heist went bad and the statue you stole at the top of that big Skyscrapper turned out to be cursed. You need to crank it every 10 seconds to keep it from raising the alarm with its cymbals !!

The JAM version is gonna be the LD51 JAM version version, although v0.6.1 only has bug fixes, balancing for the pitch stains and some minor aesthetics changes.
